languages.text: {n}...и вы замечаете искру в темных глазах и намек на улыбку в искривленных в шипении губах. Маражай мог бы легко оторвать вашу ладонь от шеи, если бы захотел — он явно с наслаждением вам подыгрывает.{/n}

{n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...и вы замечаете искру в темных глазах и намек на улыбку в искривленных в шипении губах. Маражай мог бы легко оторвать вашу ладонь от шеи, если бы захотел — он явно с наслаждением вам подыгрывает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}……你注意到，玛拉斋黑洞洞的双眼中闪烁着光芒，扭曲的嘴唇上露出了一丝笑容。只要他愿意，他可以轻而易举地甩开你的手。很显然，他是在配合你的举动，而且乐在其中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……你注意到，玛拉斋黑洞洞的双眼中闪烁着光芒，扭曲的嘴唇上露出了一丝笑容。他单膝跪在地上，抬头注视着你。很显然，他是在配合你的举动，而且很明显乐在其中。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}…男の黒い瞳は輝き、曲がった唇はわずかに微笑みを浮かべている。マラズハイがその気になれば、こちらの手を軽々と首から引き離せる。男は明らかに楽しげに調子を合わせている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…男の黒い瞳は輝き、曲がった唇はわずかに微笑みを浮かべている。マラズハイがその気になれば、こちらの手を軽々と首から引き離せる。男は明らかに楽しげに調子を合わせている。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}... y notas el brillo de sus ojos oscuros y una sonrisa en sus labios retorcidos. Marazhai podría quitar tu mano de su cuello sin ninguna dificultad si quisiera: te está siguiendo el juego y disfrutando de lo lindo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... y ves el destello de sus ojos oscuros y el atisbo de una sonrisa en sus labios torcidos. El arrodillado Marazhai levanta la vista para mirarte; te está siguiendo el juego, y es obvio que lo está disfrutando.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}C'est alors que vous remarquez l'éclat qui anime ses yeux sombres et l'esquisse d'un sourire sur ses lèvres grimaçantes. Marazhai n'aurait aucun mal à se libérer de votre étreinte s'il le voulait, et s'il joue le jeu, c'est uniquement parce que cela l'amuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}C'est alors que vous remarquez l'éclat qui anime ses yeux sombres et l'esquisse d'un sourire sur ses lèvres grimaçantes. Toujours à genoux, Marazhai lève le regard vers vous et joue le jeu avec un plaisir évident.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}... und dann fällt dir das Funkeln in seinen dunklen Augen auf und wie sich ein Lächeln auf seinen verzerrten Lippen bildet. Marazhai könnte mühelos deine Hand von seinem Hals reißen, wenn er wollte ... er spielt aber mit offensichtlicher Freude mit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... und dann fällt dir das Funkeln in seinen dunklen Augen auf und wie sich ein Lächeln auf seinen verzerrten Lippen bildet. Marazhai könnte mühelos deine Hand von seinem Hals reißen, wenn er wollte ... er spielt aber mit offensichtlicher Freude mit.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ardından kara gözlerinde bir parıltı, kıvrılmış dudaklarında bir tutam gülümseme olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Marazhai eğer isteseydi elini kolaylıkla parçalayarak boynundan çekebilirdi. Büyük bir keyifle sana eşlik ettiği belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you notice the gleam in his dark eyes and the hint of a smile on his twisted lips. Marazhai could easily rip your hand from his neck if he wanted to — he is playing along with obvious enjoyment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ardından kara gözlerinde bir parıltı ve kıvrılmış dudaklarında bir tutam gülümseme fark ediyorsun. Marazhai, eğer isteseydi elini kolaylıkla parçalayarak boynundan çekebilirdi. Büyük bir keyifle sana eşlik ettiği belli.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
